welcomeText:
# I'm Dawid G. Horacy. Welcome to my DNS placeholder site.

 ### Deep Tech Engineer, Evangelist and Entrepreneurial Spirit. Talk to me about applied Machine Learning, Robotics and DLT.

I write about exponential thinking in relation to emerging economic models enabled by the new blockchain-enabled economy since 2017. 

**[Click here to be redirected if the redirect does not work. ](https://medium.com/@dawid.golebiewski)**

Professionally I develop and implement automation strategies for businesses in all industries. Beyond that I facilitate, design and advise at the intersection of Applied Machine Learning, Distributed Ledger Technologies and the Digital Transition.
title: Home
